channel.title: Editing Item Stats?
channel.description:
I need to know how to edit an items stats!? I want to fix the Anger axe and Sword, I want to fix the VOID and I want to make some certain weapons extra powerful =)
please post if you can help..
P.S. Do you have teamviewer4?

item.title: Editing Item Stats?
item.dc:creator: @brenda brenda
item.description:
@brenda wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:6, topic:300161”][quote author=brenda link=topic=396446.msg2944510#msg2944510 date=1252128734]
UMM can someone tell me how to edit the hp bonus an item gives? like what number space is it? example strength is space 14…what space is health!? thanks =)

OH AND defense bonuses and what not =)
[/quote]
We are not spoonfeeders here, you know how to add it, now just try it out and see what does what, i suggest doing 1 2 3 4 5 for the stats, as you go down the line, and go like 25 times to see what tab does what. 2nd, in .cfg files you use tab, not space. If you use space you will get errors[/quote]

I know its not spoonfeeding -.-. I ask for 2 more things and i get shot down. really nice person u are…soo any1 that CAN AND WILLHELP plz tell me which “tab” column is for defense and hp stats? thanks =)

PLEASE HELP ME OUT HERE GUYS!

People I really need help with this plz!.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 05, 2009, 11:12:14 pm[/size][hr]Sorry for double post =(. I just really need this answered!!

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Item Stats?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“brenda, post:5, topic:300161”]UMM can someone tell me how to edit the hp bonus an item gives? like what number space is it? example strength is space 14…what space is health!? thanks =)

OH AND defense bonuses and what not =)[/quote]
We are not spoonfeeders here, you know how to add it, now just try it out and see what does what, i suggest doing 1 2 3 4 5 for the stats, as you go down the line, and go like 25 times to see what tab does what. 2nd, in .cfg files you use tab, not space. If you use space you will get errors

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Item Stats?
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

go to config and click on item. not item.java, item.cfg open with notepad. if your weapon is 2h weapon, search for dragon 2h if it is a scimi search for dragon scimi. copy the whole line of code. scroll all the way down and after the last item on there past the code. change the first numbers, the id of the item, to your weapon id. then the name, then the examine info. go right till you see 95 or something, it’s the dragon 2h’s str bonus, change that number. if you want it to be a 1 hit weapon just change it to 999999. save it. no need to compile because it isnt a .class file so just go ahead and run your server and good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Item Stats?
item.dc:creator: @brenda brenda
item.description:
@brenda wrote:

ERM can u please rephrase that caz i couldnt quite understand. and how do i edit .cfg?

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Item Stats?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

In your item.cfg. Type the item = ID after write examine thing and after write 15 numbers. Second number is price of item and the 14th number is strength bonus.

Good luck.

Read full topic
